name: WBM 10-in-1 Laundry Pods, Total 128 Count, High Efficiency, Ultra Concentrate with Powerful Stain Lifter Technology, Fabric Softener With Rose Extracts, Detergent Pods
short_description: 10 in 1 laundry pods are soft, skin-friendly, and dissolve quickly in water, providing a deep, gentle clean for all types of fabrics while being tough on dirt and stains.
Infused with natural rose extracts, these laundry detergent pods keep your clothes smelling fresh for an extended period, delivering a refreshing floral scent with every wash.
Our resalable zip-lock bag contains 128 detergent pods, keeping them secure and protected from spills while offering easy storage and maintaining the pods' freshness.
These pods washing detergent are designed to tackle tough stains, brighten your clothes, and leave them with a fresh scent, delivering a powerful clean with every laundry load.
Laundry pods detergent dissolve completely in both hot and cold water and work efficiently in any washing machine, providing a hassle-free laundry experience every time.
product_description: WBM laundry pods are made with natural plant extracts & essential oils. Detergent pods hold powerful cleaning formula with a multifunctional 3-cavity design. Deep cleaning protects the clothing element and saves fabric from damage. WBM laundry pods are a 10-in-1 breakthrough laundry solution with color protection, soft and skin-friendly, lasting fragrance, 3D stain removal, and quickly soluble in water that gives you more bang for your buck. The pack holds efficient cleaning power in an innovative, three-chamber design, separating key ingredients until they hit the wash for maximum cleaning power. More than just a liquid in a pouch, these are formulated laundry packs reveal the brightest clean yet. Its special film enables the multi-chamber technology to dissolve in both hot & cold water. WBM pods give rich suds. It targets tough stains and works in both high productivity and standard washing machines. WBM packs are safe for septic systems and as always contain no phosphates. Looking for a fresh scent, efficient, clear, and natural detergent pod for your clothes, and then you are on the right way. WBM laundry pods are specially designed to be free of dyes and artificial perfumes. Simply put one pod into the water for most loads, but use two pods for heavy and more loads. You can use three pods for extra-large loads. For a simple and worry-free laundry experience, try WBM laundry pods that are gentle on skin and clothes. Warnings keep it away from the reach of children and pets and try not to place the item in your mouth since it could be unsafe whenever swallowed. Do not use it for pretreatment and hand washing.
product_details: Usage ‎Chemical Free, Color Safe, Dye Free, Natural, Septic Safe, Stain Remover

product_description: Face it, the world can be a really dirty place. Coffee mugs get jostled, flowerbeds get weeded, and home plates get slid into. In a world where common stains can be moments away, you need a clean that can stand up to them while being gentle on skin. Tide PODS Free And Gentle Laundry Detergent Pacs deliver the cleaning power you want without dyes or perfumes and are specially formulated for those with sensitive skin. Tide PODS Free And Gentle laundry detergent is certified by the NEA and NPF. Each pre measured pac combines concentrated detergent, powerful stain removers, and color protectors into one convenient 3 in 1 Laundry POD. Tide PODS Free And Gentle cleans better than the leading Free detergent pacs and works on 100 percent of common stains, while being safe to use on all washable fabrics. They dissolve and clean effectively in any machine and water temperature, including cold washes. These laundry detergent pods are a strong option for fragrance free laundry routines, free and gentle laundry preferences, and unscented laundry needs where sensitive detergent is important.

product_description: Save time and money with Grab Green 3 in 1 Laundry Detergent Pods. To protect your family, we developed our powder pods to contain multiple layers of safety: simple, white powder pods don't look like irresistible colorful candy. They are difficult to swallow. Grab Green is a female and mother owned and operated company that provides naturally derived and non-toxic laundry, home cleaning, and personal care products 100% made in the USA.
